You can see how many points you scored this week and in previous weeks on the results page.

Hi {{username}},

How did you do?

The final score was {{home_team}} {{home_score}} - {{away_score}} {{away_team}}.
You can see how many points you scored this week and in previous weeks on the results page: https://www.superleigh.co.uk/results/
Don't forget to see how well you did compared to others on the leaderboard: https://www.superleigh.co.uk/leaderboard/
This also means the next round is now open so you can get your next predictions in early: https://www.superleigh.co.uk/play/

The Super Leigh Team
